name: Virtual Fantasy
description:
Harold, a successful game developer is trying to make a Virtual Reality Game that will be as close as to second reality,with a fantasy theme, where all the player will get the experience of an adventurer.

When the game is finish, Harold is the first one to play in the game…and suddenly something unexpected happen Harold is now stuck in the game.

What will he do? Will he be able to leave his own game that he made?  

This is my first game, and I know there's a lot of thing that I've done wrong...so please give your feedback so that I can improve as a game developer. Thank you.
